com.compendium.core.db.management
Class DBDatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.core.db.management.DBDatabaseManager

public class DBDatabaseManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class, with the help of the DBConnectionManager, opens connections for databases. These connection objects can be requested by the services, and the services objects can use these connection objects to call database operations.

Field Summary
private  java.lang.String file
          The name of the file in which to find the list of any old Compendium Access database
private  java.util.Hashtable htDatabases
          A hashtable of database names and references to the connection manager objects for a database.
private  int nDatabaseType
          The type of database being used
private  java.lang.String sDatabaseIP
          The password to use when accessing the database
private  java.lang.String sDatabasePassword
          The password to use when accessing the database
private  java.lang.String sDatabaseUserName
          The name to use whn accessing the database
 
Constructor Summary

          This constructor is for use with Derby database.

Constructor Detail

DBDatabaseManager

public DBDatabaseManager(int nDatabaseType)
This constructor is for use with Derby database.

DBDatabaseManager

public DBDatabaseManager(int nDatabaseType,
                         java.lang.String sDatabaseUserName,
                         java.lang.String sDatabasePassword)
This constructor takes a name and password to use when accessing the database.

Parameters:
sDatabaseUserName, - the name to use when creating the connection to the database
sDatabasePassword, - the password to use when connection to the database.

DBDatabaseManager

public DBDatabaseManager(int nDatabaseType,
                         java.lang.String sDatabaseUserName,
                         java.lang.String sDatabasePassword,
                         java.lang.String sDatabaseIP)
This constructor takes a name and password to use when accessing the database, and the IP address of the MysqL server machine.

Parameters:
sDatabaseUserName, - the name to use when creating the connection to the database
sDatabasePassword, - the password to use when connection to the database.
sDatabaseIP, - the IP address of the server machine. The default if 'localhost'.
Method Detail

getDatabaseType

public int getDatabaseType()
Return the type of database this object is Managing.

hasAccessDatabases

public boolean hasAccessDatabases()
Check to see if there is a Database.ini file referencing Access Databases. This is needed for crossover from Access to MySQL.

Returns:
true if the file exists, false if it does not.

loadAccessDatabases

private void loadAccessDatabases()
Load the Access database references from the database.ini file.

getAccessProjects

public java.lang.String getAccessProjects()
This method returns a list of all Compendium Access databases available.

Returns:
String of project database names.

openProject

public boolean openProject(java.lang.String sDatabaseName)
This method opens a project by setting up a DBConnectionManager for the project.

Parameters:
String - sDatabaseName, the name of the database project to open a connection for.
Returns:
true, if connection opened, false if there was an error.

requestConnection

public DBConnection requestConnection(java.lang.String sDatabaseName)
This method is called by a service requesting a database connection and returns null if connection could not be obtained.

Parameters:
String - sDatabaseName, the name of the database to create a connection to.
Returns:
DBConnection, a connection to the spcified database, or null if the connection could not be made.

releaseConnection

public boolean releaseConnection(java.lang.String sDatabaseName,
                                 DBConnection dbcon)
This method is called by a service to release a connection that it has been using.

Parameters:
String - sDatabaseName, the name of the database to release the connection for.
DBConnection - dbcon, the connection to release.
Returns:
boolean, true if the database was found, else false.

removeAllConnections

public boolean removeAllConnections(java.lang.String sDatabaseName)
Removes all the connection relating to a database project, if the service manager has no active clients connected to the project.

Parameters:
String - sDatabaseName, the name of the database to release all connection for.
Returns:
boolean, true if the database was found, else false.
